alert.note: Alert for Apache Junction, Gold Canyon; Cave Creek, New River; Dripping Springs; East Valley; Fountain Hills, East Mesa; Globe, Miami; Mazatzal Mountains; New River Mesa; Northwest Pinal County; Pinal, Superstition Mountains; Rio Verde, Salt River; San Carlos; Southeast Gila County; Southeast Valley, Queen Creek; Superior; Tonto Basin (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 21 at 3:10PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...STRONG TO SEVERE THUNDERSTORMS EXPECTED ACROSS GILA...MARICOPA AND PINAL COUNTIES... Conditions are favorable for the development of isolated to scattered strong to severe thunderstorms through the rest of the afternoon across eastern Maricopa, Pinal, and Gila Counties. Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and half inch hail will be possible with any strong storm with the possibility of a few isolated severe thunderstorms. Locations impacted include... Mesa, Gilbert, Apache Junction, Florence, Fountain Hills, Coolidge, Globe, Superior, Sycamore Creek, Roosevelt, East Mesa, Sunflower, Gold Canyon, Sugarloaf Mountain, Ballantine Trailhead, Round Valley, Queen Creek, San Carlos, Miami, and Gold Camp. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
